metadata.title: CVE-2016-6223 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The TIFFReadRawStrip1 and TIFFReadRawTile1 functions in tif_read.c inlibtiff before 4.0.7 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(crash) or possibly obtain sensitive information via a negative index in afile-content buffer.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6223` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff-tools - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1').
